channel.title: How to Reduce speed in deltascape?
channel.description: Hi,the deltascape's karil x bow hits to fast,it hits faster then whip,how can i change it? I made Melee weapons lower by change the loopattdelay but when i add loopatdelay for UseBow or range it doesnt atk >.> please help..
